MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Scris Studio is a group of 3 students making softwares for fun and for solving problems. Go to https://scris.top/en.html for more information!

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers.
Site.Site_Description_250: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. Work and rest, with wnr now.
Site.Site_Description_450: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. wnr has a modern interface; wnr has got multi-lingual support; wnr has got some feature to make the rules more strict, so that you must work and you must rest; wnr has got lock mode and all kinds of great functions; also, wnr is easier and more convenient to use with fine settings, including predefined tasks settings.

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win2000,WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Windows 8,Windows 10,WinServer,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Server 2000,Windows Server 2003,Windows Server 2008,Windows Server 2008r2,Windows Server 2012,Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005,Windows Media Center Edition 2005,WinVista,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,WinVista x64,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Hide from dock available (macOS). Bugs fixed. Other general optimizations made. - using iconfont instead of font-awesome - better lock mode behavior, more humanistic - better dark mode behavior - other programming updates

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Any copy of this software can be freely distributed over the Internet in an unchanged form.

English.Char_Desc_45: Work and rest, with wnr now.
English.Char_Desc_80: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers.
English.Char_Desc_250: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. Work and rest, with wnr now.
English.Char_Desc_450: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. wnr has a modern interface; wnr has got multi-lingual support; wnr has got some feature to make the rules more strict, so that you must work and you must rest; wnr has got lock mode and all kinds of great functions; also, wnr is easier and more convenient to use with fine settings, including predefined tasks settings.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. Work and rest, with wnr now.
Why you need wnr? I think there are basically three reasons.
- People often study or work too much in a row, which can lead to the decline of working efficiency.
- People sometimes stare at the screen all the day.
- People sometimes relax too much.
What's more:
- wnr has a mordern interface.
- wnr has got multi-lingual support.
- wnr has got some feature to make the rules more strict, so that you must work and you must rest.
- wnr has got lock mode, etc.
- wnr is easier and more convinient to use with fine settings, including predefined tasks settings.

Chinese.Keywords: 计时,时间管理,免费软件,中文,工作,休息,番茄工作法
Chinese.Char_Desc_45: wnr是一款跨平台的轻量计时和时间管理工具。
Chinese.Char_Desc_80: 跨平台的轻量计时和时间管理工具，让你更高效、强力地管理作与息。
Chinese.Char_Desc_250: 跨平台的轻量计时和时间管理工具，让你更高效、强力地管理作与息。如果你是一名办公室青年，那朝九晚五或是996的生活中一定是每天需要大量使用电脑；如果你是一位新时代好少年，那这段时间的网课一定已经把你逼疯：上课用电脑看网课，下课用电脑写作业，眼、身、心俱疲。 而我开发的这款工具可以解决这一问题。设定时间、定时提醒，让你可以在工作的同时得以休息，在休息中不至于忘了手头的工作。
Chinese.Char_Desc_450: 如果你是一名办公室青年，那朝九晚五或是996的生活中一定是每天需要大量使用电脑；如果你是一位新时代好少年，那这段时间的网课一定已经把你逼疯：上课用电脑看网课，下课用电脑写作业，眼、身、心俱疲。 而我开发的这款工具可以解决这一问题。设定时间、定时提醒，让你可以在工作的同时得以休息，在休息中不至于忘了手头的工作。它具有现代大方的UI与强大的兼容性，由极简原则指导，完善的基础计时功能、预设设置和语义化输入、全屏专心模式和锁定模式等应有尽有。
Chinese.Char_Desc_2000:
wnr是一款跨平台的轻量计时和时间管理工具，让你更高效、强力地管理作与息。
为什么你需要 wnr？我认为主要有三个原因。
人们常常工作或学习持续时间太久，反而降低效率。
- 人们有时不自主地一整天都盯着屏幕。 - 人们常常休息过久，忘了工作。 - wnr 就是为了解决这些问题而生的。
wnr 还有这些吸引人的地方：
- 现代的用户界面。 - 完善的语言支持。 - 具有完善的功能系统，让你更高效、更强力地管理作与息。 - 具有锁定模式 / 家长模式，整治自控能力。 - 高效易用，方便舒心。 - ……

wnr是一款跨平台的轻量计时和时间管理工具，让你更高效、强力地管理作与息。
为什么你需要 wnr？我认为主要有三个原因。
人们常常工作或学习持续时间太久，反而降低效率。

ChineseTraditional.Keywords: 計時,時間管理,免費軟件,中文,工作,休息,番茄工作法
ChineseTraditional.Char_Desc_45: wnr是壹款跨平台的輕量計時和時間管理工具。
ChineseTraditional.Char_Desc_80: 跨平台的輕量計時和時間管理工具，讓妳更高效、強力地管理作與息。
ChineseTraditional.Char_Desc_450: 如果妳是壹名辦公室青年，那朝九晚五或是996的生活中壹定是每天需要大量使用電腦；如果妳是壹位新時代好少年，那這段時間的網課壹定已經把妳逼瘋：上課用電腦看網課，下課用電腦寫作業，眼、身、心俱疲。 而我開發的這款工具可以解決這壹問題。設定時間、定時提醒，讓妳可以在工作的同時得以休息，在休息中不至于忘了手頭的工作。它具有現代大方的UI與強大的兼容性，由極簡原則指導，完善的基礎計時功能、預設設置和語義化輸入、全屏專心模式和鎖定模式等應有盡有。
ChineseTraditional.Char_Desc_250: 跨平台的輕量計時和時間管理工具，讓妳更高效、強力地管理作與息。如果妳是壹名辦公室青年，那朝九晚五或是996的生活中壹定是每天需要大量使用電腦；如果妳是壹位新時代好少年，那這段時間的網課壹定已經把妳逼瘋：上課用電腦看網課，下課用電腦寫作業，眼、身、心俱疲。 而我開發的這款工具可以解決這壹問題。設定時間、定時提醒，讓妳可以在工作的同時得以休息，在休息中不至于忘了手頭的工作。
ChineseTraditional.Char_Desc_2000:
wnr是壹款跨平台的輕量計時和時間管理工具，讓妳更高效、強力地管理作與息。
爲什麽妳需要 wnr？我認爲主要有三個原因。
人們常常工作或學習持續時間太久，反而降低效率。
- 人們有時不自主地壹整天都盯著屏幕。 - 人們常常休息過久，忘了工作。 - wnr 就是爲了解決這些問題而生的。
wnr 還有這些吸引人的地方：
- 現代的用戶界面。 - 完善的語言支持。 - 具有完善的功能系統，讓妳更高效、更強力地管理作與息。 - 具有鎖定模式 / 家長模式，整治自控能力。 - 高效易用，方便舒心。 - ……
